reviews.review: Muy buen juego aunque este repleto de cheaters
Was good in 2012, it's still good now.
The game itself is fun, but it's very easy to lose your shit in this game. But if you're a forgiving person, even just the slightest, play the game. Who knows, you'll do better than me.
